pin_yin: Bù zuò bù sǐ. 'Not do not die.'
text: If you don't do stupid things you won't end up in tragedy.

pin_yin: Sài Wēng shī mǎ, yān zhī fēi fú. 'Sai Weng [legendary old man's name] lost horse, how know not blessing'.
text: Blessings come in disguise.

pin_yin: Xiǎodòng bù bǔ, dàdòng chī kǔ.'small hole not mend; big hole eat hardship'
text: If small holes aren't fixed, then big holes will bring hardship.

pin_yin: Shuǐmǎn zé yì. 'water full but overflows'
text: Water flows in only to flow out.

in_chinese: 读万卷书不如行万里路。
pin_yin: Dú wànjuànshū bù rú xíng wànlǐlù. 'reading 10,000 books, not as good as walking 10,000 li road'
text: It's better to walk thousands of miles than to read thousands of books.

pin_yin: Sān gè héshàng méi shuǐ hē. 'three monks have no water to drink'
text: Too many cooks spoil the broth.

pin_yin: Yī xiào jiě qiānchou. 'one smile undoes 1,000 worries'
text: A smile dispels many worries.

pin_yin: Xiào yī xiào, shínián shào. 'laugh,ten years younger'
text: Happiness is the best cosmetic.

pin_yin: Měimíng shèng guò měimào. 'beautiful name beats beautiful looks'
text: A good name is better than a good face.

pin_yin: Bú shànshǐzhě bù shànzhōng. 'not good starter not good end'
text: A bad beginning makes a bad ending.

pin_yin: Dàchù zhuó yǎn, xiǎochù zhuó shǒu. 'big points apply eye; small points apply hand'
text: Keep the general goal in sight while tackling daily tasks.

pin_yin: Yībù yīgè jiǎoyìn. 'one step one footprint'
text: Every step makes a footprint.

pin_yin: Yīgè luóbo yīgè kēngr. 'one turnip one hole'
text: Each has his own task, and nobody is dispensable.

in_chinese: 留得青山在，不怕没柴烧。
pin_yin: Liú dé qīngshān zài, búpà méi chái shāo. 'remain green hills present, not fear no firewood burn'
text: While there are green hills, there'll be wood to burn.

in_chinese: 一鸟在手胜过双鸟在林。
pin_yin: Yī niǎo zài shǒu shèng guò shuāng niǎo zài lín 'one bird in hand beats pair birds in forest'
text: A bird in the hand is worth than two in the bush.

pin_yin: Rén wú wánrén, jīn wú zúchì. 'man lackperfect man; gold lack enoughred'
text: No man is a perfect man; no gold is sufficiently bare.

in_chinese: 千军易得, 一将难求。
pin_yin: Qiānjūn yìdé, yī jiang nánqiú. 'thousand army easy obtain; one general hard request'
text: It is easy to find a thousand soldiers, but hard to find a good general.

pin_yin: Zǎixiànɡ dùlǐ hǎo chēnɡchuán. 'prime minister stomach inside good-to pole boat'
text: A prime minister's mind should be broad enough for poling a boat.

pin_yin: Nándé hútu. 'hard get confusion'
text: Ignorance is bliss.

pin_yin: Huò cóng kǒu chū. 'disaster from mouth exits'
text: Disaster comes from careless talk.

in_chinese: 三人一条心，黄土变成金。
pin_yin: Sānrén yìtiáoxīn, huángtǔ biàn chéng jīn. 'three people one heart; yellow earth become gold'
text: If people are of one heart, even loess can become gold.

pin_yin: Shēnzhèng búpà yǐngzi xié. 'body straight not fear shadow slanting'
text: One who stands straight doesn't fear a crooked shadow.

pin_yin: Yǒu jiè yǒu huán, zài jiè bùnán. Have loan have repayment; again loan not hard.
text: Timely return of a loan makes it easier to borrow a second time.

in_chinese: 蜡烛照亮别人，却毁灭了自己。
pin_yin: Làzhú zhàoliàng biérén, què huǐmiè le zìjǐ. 'candle illuminates others, yet destroys itself'
text: A candle lights others and consumes itself.

in_chinese: 种瓜得瓜, 种豆得豆。
pin_yin: Zhòngguā dé guā, zhòngdòu dé dòu. 'sow melons reap melons; sow beans reap beans'
text: You reap what you sow.

pin_yin: Yù sù zé bùdá. 'Desire speed but not attain.'
text: Those who just want speed don't succeed.

in_chinese: 近水知鱼性, 近山识鸟音。
pin_yin: Jìn shuǐ zhī yúxìng; jìn shān shí niǎoyīn. 'near water know fish shape, near mountain know bird sound'
text: To know a fish go to the water; to know a bird's song go to the mountains.

in_chinese: 听君一席话，胜读十年书。
pin_yin: Tīng jūn yīxíhuà, shèng dú shíniánshū 'hear gentleman remarks, beats reading ten year books'
text: Listening to a lord's remarks is better than reading books for ten years.

in_chinese: 凡人不可貌相, 海水不可斗量。
pin_yin: Fánrén bù kě màoxiàng, hǎishuǐ bù kě dòuliàng. 'mortals can't judge by appearance, sea water can't cup measure'
text: Man cannot be judged by looks; seas cannot be measured by cup.

pin_yin: Yǒuyuán qiānlǐ lái xiānghuì. 'Have fate 1,000 li [or a long way] together meet'
text: Fate brings people together from far apart.

pin_yin: Jūnzǐ zhī jiāo dàn rú shuǐ 'gentleman's friendship bland like water'
text: A gentleman's friendship is insipid as water.

pin_yin: Rù xiāng suí sú 'enter district follow custom'
text: When entering a locality follow the local customs.

pin_yin: Huànnàn jiàn zhēnqíng 'Hardship see true situation'
text: In hardship we see true friendship.

pin_yin: Zhīyīn nánmì. 'soul mate hard find'
text: An intimate friend is hard to find.

pin_yin: Guǎng jiāoyǒu, wú shēnjiāo. 'widely make friends, no deep friendship'
text: Numerous friends means no deep friendship.

pin_yin: Dào bùtóng, bù xiāng wéi móu. 'principles different, not harmonious for schemes'
text: Men of different principles don't work well together.

pin_yin: Yíjiàn zhōngqíng. 'one look fall-in-love'
text: Love at first sight.

in_chinese: 愿得一人心，白首不相离。
pin_yin: Yuàndé yīrénxīn, báishǒu bùxiānglí. 'wish get a person heart, white head not one-another apart
text: Long for a heart, never be apart.

pin_yin: Zhí zǐ zhī shǒu, yǔ zǐ xiélǎo. 'grasp your hand, with you grow-old-together
text: Hold hands with you, grow old with you.

pin_yin: Ai wū jí wū. 'love house and crow'
text: Love the house and its crow.

pin_yin: Luóbo qīngcài, gè yǒu suǒ ài. 'radishes greens, each have that-which loves'
text: Radishes and greens, each have those who love them.

in_chinese: 在天愿作比翼鸟，在地愿为连理枝。
pin_yin: Zài tiān yuàn zuò bǐyìniǎo, zài dì yuàn wéi liánlǐzhī. 'in sky wish be fly-wing-to-wing birds; on earth wish be grow-together branches.
text: Birds flying in the sky as one; branches growing on the earth as one.

pin_yin: Yǒuqínɡrén zhōnɡ chénɡ juànshǔ. 'in-love people finally become spouses'
text: People in love become spouses in the end.

pin_yin: Qínɡrén yǎnlǐ chū xīshī. 'lover eye inside appears Xishi [name; foremost of the Four Legendary Chinese Beauties]
text: In a lover's eye is the foremost Beauty.

pin_yin: Ài zhī shēn zé zhī qiē. 'love's deep, discipline's cutting'
text: Love deep, chastise deep.

in_chinese: 有情饮水饱，无情食饭饥。
pin_yin: Yǒuqínɡ yínshuǐbǎo, wúqínɡ shífànjī. 'Have affection drink water full; no affection eat food hungry'
text: With love water is enough; without love food doesn't satisfy.

in_chinese: 月到中秋分外明，每逢佳节倍思亲。
pin_yin: Yuè dào zhōngqiū fènwài míng, měi féng jiājié bèi sīqīn. 'moon reach Mid-Autumn exceptionally bright, every holiday multiply homesick'
text: The harvest moon is brightest; every festival homesickness multiplies.

pin_yin: Er xíng qiānlǐ mǔ dānyōu. 'son travels 1,000 li [a long way; 500 km] mother worries'
text: When children travel far, mothers worry.

in_chinese: 但愿人长久，千里共婵娟。
pin_yin: Dànyuàn rénchángjiǔ, qiānlǐ gòngchánjuān. 'Yet wish personlong-time, 1,000 li [a long way; 500 km] share moon[beauty]'
text: Wishing us long life, though sharing moonlight from afar.

pin_yin: Jiāhé wànshìxīnɡ. 'family harmonious everything prospers'
text: If a family is harmonious everything will go well.

pin_yin: Jiājiā yǒu běn nán niàn de jīnɡ. 'Every-family has own difficult remembered experience.'
text: Every family has its problems.

pin_yin: Qīnɡɡuān nán duàn jiāwùshì. 'honest-official difficult judge household affairs.
text: Even an upright official finds it hard to settle a family quarrel.

pin_yin: Yǒuqífù，bìyǒuqízǐ. 'have his father, must have his son'
text: Where there's a father, there's his son.

pin_yin: Jiāchǒu bù kě wài yánɡ. 'family shame can't outside propagate'
text: Family shames must not be spread abroad.

pin_yin: Bù dānɡjiā，bù zhī cháimǐ ɡuì. 'Not manage household, not know firewood rice precious'
text: If you don't run the family, you don't know the value of fuel and rice.

in_chinese: 金窝，银窝，不如自家的狗窝。
pin_yin: Jīnwō, yínwō, bùrú zìjiā de ɡǒuwō. 'gold nest, silver nest, not-as-good-as own family's kennel'
text: Gold and silver nests can't beat one's family kennel.

pin_yin: Bīngdòng sān chǐ, fēi yīrì zhī hán. 'freeze 3 chi [3 chi = 1 meter], not one day's cold'
text: It takes more than one cold day for a river to freeze a meter deep.

pin_yin: Jī bùkě shī, shí búzài lái. 'Opportunity can't lose, time not again come'
text: Don't miss opportunities: time doesn't come round again.

pin_yin: Rénxīn qí, Tàishān yí. 'people heart together, Mount Tai move'
text: When people work with one heart, they can even move Mount Tai. Tweet

pin_yin: Wànshì kāitóu nán. 'everything start difficult'
text: All things are difficult at the start. Tweet

pin_yin: Shībài shì chénggōng zhī mǔ. 'failure is success's mother'
text: Failure is the mother of success.

in_chinese: 只要功夫深，铁杵磨成针。
pin_yin: Zhǐyào gōngfū shēn, tiěchǔ mó chén gzhēn. 'just need effort deep, iron rod grind become needle'
text: It just needs hard work to grind an iron rod into a needle.

pin_yin: Shuǐ dī shí chuān, shéng jù mù duàn. 'water drop stone pierce, rope saw wood sever'
text: Water drops pierce stone; rope saws cut wood.

pin_yin: Yīrì zhī jì zàiyú chén. 'a day's plan lies in dawn'
text: A day's planning is done at dawn.

pin_yin: Qiānlǐ zhī xíng, shǐyú zúxià. 1,000-li [500 km or a long way] journey, start with foot down.
text: A thousand-li journey starts with a footfall.

pin_yin: Pǐ jí tài lái. 'evil extreme peace come'
text: Peace replaces extreme evil.

pin_yin: Qīng chūyú lán ér shèngyú lán. 'green come-from blue moreover surpasses blue'
text: Green is from blue, and better than blue.

pin_yin: Lǎojì fúlì, zhì zài qiānlǐ. 'old warhorse lie stable, ambition at 1,000 li [500 km; a long way]
text: An old warhorse in the stable still longs to gallop a thousand li.

in_chinese: 吃得苦中苦，方为人上人。
pin_yin: Chī dé kǔzhōngkǔ, fāng wéi rénshàngrén. 'eat gain pain in pain, method for man on man'
text: Enduring deepening pain is how man ascends.

pin_yin: Xiān dào xiān dé. 'first arrive first get'
text: The first to arrive is the first to succeed.

pin_yin: Shǒu dé yún kāi jiàn yuèmíng. 'keep-watch gain cloud open see moonlight'
text: Watch till clouds part to see moonlight.

pin_yin: Nìjìng chū réncái. 'adversity produces talented-person'
text: Adversity yields flair.

pin_yin: Chī yīqiàn, zhǎng yízhì. 'eat a moat, grow a wisdom'
text: Suffer a moat, grow in wisdom.

pin_yin: Bùnéng yīkǒu chī chéng pàngzi. 'can't one mouthful eat become fat-person'
text: You can't get fat with one mouthful.

pin_yin: Fēng wú chángshùn, bīng wú chángshèng. 'wind not always favorable; soldiers not always win'
text: Wind isn't always favorable; soldiers aren't always victorious.

pin_yin: Xīngxīng zhī huǒ, kěyǐ liáoyuan. 'star's fire, can shine far'
text: Starlight shines far.

pin_yin: Āibīng bì sheng. 'sorrowful soldiers must win'
text: An aggrieved army is sure to win.

pin_yin: Shū shì suíshí xiédài de huāyuán. 'book is at-all-times carried garden'
text: A book is a pocket garden.

pin_yin: Huó dào lǎo, xué dào lǎo. 'live till old, study till old.
text: Live till you're old, and study till you're old.

pin_yin: Hǎoshū rú zhìyǒu. 'good book as-good-as close-friend'
text: A good book is like a good friend.

in_chinese: 一寸光阴一寸金，寸金难买寸光阴。
pin_yin: Yícùn guāngyīn yícùnjīn, cùnjīn nán mǎi cùnguāngyīn. '1 cun [Chinese inch, 1/30 m] time 1 cun gold, cun gold difficult buy cun time'
text: An inch of time is worth an inch of gold, but an inch of gold may not buy an inch of time.

pin_yin: Hǎojìxìng bù rú lànbǐtóu. 'good memory not-as-good-as rotten pen'
text: A good memory can't beat a bad pen.

in_chinese: 花有重开日，人无再少年。
pin_yin: Huā yǒu chóng kāi rì, rén wú zài shào nián. 'flower has again open day, people no again youth'
text: Flowers may bloom again; you're never young again.

in_chinese: 学而不思则罔，思而不学则殆。
pin_yin: Xué ér bùsī zé wǎng, sī ér bùxué zé dài. 'study but not think then deceive, think but not study then dangerous'
text: Learning without thought is deceptive; thought without learning is perilous.

pin_yin: Shū dào yòngshí fāng hènshǎo. 'books till use time just-when hate few'
text: When using books, you'll regret reading few.

in_chinese: 读书须用意，一字值千金。
pin_yin: dúshū xū yòngyì, yīzì zhí qiānjīn. 'reading books needs use attention, one word worth 1,000 gold'
text: Reading requires concentration; a word may be worth a fortune.

pin_yin: Yánshī chū gāotú. 'strict teacher produces brilliant student'
text: Strict teachers produce fine students.

pin_yin: Shìshí shèng yú xióngbiàn.
text: Facts beat eloquence.

pin_yin: Yìyán jì chū, sìmǎ nán zhuī. 'a word already produced, team-of-4-horses difficult chase'
text: A team of horses will struggle to chase down a spoken word.

in_chinese: 路遥知马力，日久见人心。
pin_yin: Lùyáo zhī mǎlì, rìjiǔ jiàn rénxīn. 'road distant know horse strength, days old see man heart'
text: As distance tests a horse's strength, time reveals a person's character.

pin_yin: Wú guīju bù chéng fāngyuán. 'no standards not become perimeter'
text: Without standards no boundaries are set.

pin_yin: Chéngqiánbìhòu. 'punish before prevent after'
text: Punishing those who come before stops those who come after from doing something.

pin_yin: Sānsī ér hòu xíng. "three thoughts and after act"
text: Think thrice before you act.

pin_yin: Liángyào kǔ kǒu 'good medicine bitter mouth'
text: Good medicine tastes bitter.

in_chinese: 有理走遍天下，无理寸步难行。
pin_yin: Yǒulǐ zǒubiàn tiānxià, wúlǐ cùnbù nánxíng. 'have truth walk all land-under-heaven; no truth cun [Chinese inch; 1/30 m] step difficult walk'
text: With truth on your side, you can go anywhere; without truth, you can't take a tiny step.

pin_yin: Dāngjúzhě mí, pángguānzhě qīng. 'player confused; spectator clear'
text: The player is lost; the watcher is lucid.

pin_yin: Shínián shù mù, bǎinián shù rén. '10 years cultivate wood, 100 years cultivate man'
text: Ten years to cultivate wood, a hundred years to cultivate a man.

pin_yin: Mín yǐ shí wéi tiān. Subjects think food is heaven.
text: Food is the first priority of the people.

pin_yin: Shàn yǒu shànbào. 'good have good recompense'
text: Repay good with good.

pin_yin: Gù zuǒyòu ér yán tā. 'deliberately approximate and talk something-else'
text: Deliberately vague and deflective.

pin_yin: Jǐjiā huānxǐ jǐjiā chou. 'few families happy few families worried'
text: While some are happy, some are anxious.

pin_yin: Rén guò liúmíng, yàn guò liúsheng. 'man passes leaves name, swallow passes leaves sound'
text: A person leaves a reputation, as a swallow leaves its call.

pin_yin: Wànshì jù bèi, zhǐ qiàn dōngfēng. 'all ready, only lack east wind'
text: Everything's ready except the east wind.

pin_yin: Máquè suī xiǎo, wǔzàng jù quán. 'sparrow although small, five organs entirely complete'
text: Small as it is, the sparrow has all the vital organs.

pin_yin: Guìlín shānshuǐ jiǎtiānxià. Guilin mountains-and-water best under-heaven
text: Guilin's scenery's best on earth.

pin_yin: Yǎba chī jiǎozi, xīnlǐ yǒushù. 'mute eats dumplings, heart inside has number'
text: When a mute eats dumplings, he knows how many he has eaten.

pin_yin: Rén féng xǐshì jīngshén shuǎng. 'man meet happy-occasion spirit invigorated'
text: A happy occasion gladdens the spirit.

pin_yin: Yī jǔ liǎng dé. 'one move two gains'
text: Two benefits from one action.

pin_yin: Rú zuò zhēnzhān. 'like sit needle felt'
text: Like sitting on a carpet of needles.

pin_yin: Nì lái shùn shòu. 'adversity come follow receive'
text: When adversity comes, receive it favorably.

pin_yin: Huà gāngē wéiyùbó. 'change shield spear for jade silk'
text: Replace weapons with jade and silk.

pin_yin: Cǐ dì wú yín sānbǎi liǎng. 'this ground no silver 300 taels'
text: This ground doesn't have 300 taels of silver.

pin_yin: Bīng bù yàn zhà.
text: Soldiers don't hate deceit.

in_chinese: 木已成舟，生米煮成熟饭。
pin_yin: Mù yǐ chéng zhōu, Shēngmǐ zhǔ chéng shúfàn. 'timber already become boat;raw rice boiled into cooked rice'
text: The timber's already a boat; the rice is cooked.

pin_yin: Shēn tǐlì xíng. 'body physical-strength acts'
text: A body acts according to physical strength.

pin_yin: Dàzhì ruò yú. 'great wisdom seem stupid'
text: Great wisdom can seem foolish.

pin_yin: Jiézú xiān dēng. 'quick foot first climb'
text: The quick footed climb first.

pin_yin: Lóng fēi fèn gwǔ. 'dragon flies phoenix dances'
text: The dragon flies and the phoenix dances.

pin_yin: Lóng mǎ jīngshén. 'dragon horse spirit'
text: A dragon's and a horse's spirit.

pin_yin: Yú lóng hùnzá. 'fish dragons muddle mix'
text: A muddled mix of fish and dragons.

pin_yin: Lóng téng hǔ yuè. 'dragon soars tiger leaps'
text: Dragons soaring and tigers leaping.

pin_yin: Chē shuǐ mǎ long. 'carriage water horse dragon'
text: Carriages like a stream and horses like a dragon.

pin_yin: Lóng tán hǔ xué. 'dragon pool tiger cave'
text: A dragon's pool and a tiger's den.

pin_yin: Huàlóngdiǎnjīng. 'paint dragon dot eye'
text: Paint a dragon and dot the eye.

pin_yin: Yè Gōng hào long.
text: Lord Ye loves dragons.

pin_yin: Lǐyú tiào lóng mén. 'carp jump dragon gate'
text: A carp has jumped the dragon's gate.

pin_yin: Qiáng lóng nán yā dìtóu shé. 'strong dragon difficult suppress local snake'
text: Even a dragon struggles to control a snake in its native haunt.
